job_title: Traveling HVAC Controls Commissioning Field Service Tech
job_description:
• Software Engineer I Locations Salem, OR, United States Posting Date01/29/2026 Trending As a Software Engineer I here at Honeywell, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining software applications and solutions that meet the needs of our customers.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
• In this role, you will play a key part in defining software requirements, designing embedded solutions, and verifying system performance, ensuring our maintenance systems meet the evolving needs of modern aircraft.
• The ideal candidate will bring hands‑on experience with system‑level testing, REST APIs, structured data formats, and embedded or IoT platforms to ensure the reliability, performance, and compliance of technologies deployed across mission‑critical environments worldwide.
• Software Engineer II - Flight Systems Locations Phoenix, AZ, United States (Hybrid) Posting Date01/27/2026 Trending Senior Advanced Embedded Software Engineer - C, C++, Linux Locations Phoenix, AZ, United States Posting Date01/21/2026 Software Engineer & Computer Science - Recent Grad/Full Time Locations United States Posting Date08/29/2025 Trending As a Recent Graduate here at Honeywell, you will have the opportunity to kickstart your career by working alongside experienced professionals in a dynamic and innovative environment.
• You will work in a dynamic environment, collaborating with experienced engineers and gaining hands-on experience in software development.
• Your skills will drive project success and business growth.
• Software Engineer & Computer Science - Summer 2026 Intern (US Person Required) Locations United States Posting Date08/29/2025 Trending Through hands-on learning experiences, global exposure, networking, and professional development opportunities, Honeywell interns will shape the future.
